text:
My name is Sheriann. I have terminal brain cancer. I use RSO (Cannabis Oil) to keep my tumor from returning. I live on a pension of 997.00 a month. I am kindly asking for donations of RSO. If you can help me please DM. Thank you 💚🇨🇦🙏

#cannabis #ricksimpsonoil #cancer #help https://t.co/9rfHW5nc8J
